title: Could you survive in the Aiel Waste?
endMessageBad: Luckily for you, unlike in the Three-fold land, there are second chances here!
endMessageGood: Well done! You would definitely survive in the Three-fold Land.
endMessagePerfect: Perfect! You could be a Wise one or Clan chief!

questions.question: What is the name of the scarf the Aiel wear to hide their face when fighting?
questions.explanation: Rand sees the origins of the modern Aiel and the Shoufa in his visions of the past in the glass columns in Rhuidean.

questions.question: At the time of the main story, how many Aiel clans are there?
questions.explanation: There used to be 13 Aiel clans, but the Jenn Aiel who continued to follow the Way of the Leaf, went extinct.
